# Resonating Resistance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], Mortal Hunter 4, [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, Fiend

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** Caster

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)­, pg. 102

The caster improves his spell resistance. Each time a foe attempts to bypass the caster’s spell resistance, it must make a spell resistance check twice. If either check fails, the foe fails to bypass the spell resistance.

The caster must have spell resistance as an extraordinary ability for *resonating resistance* to function. Spell resistance granted by a magic item or the *[[Spell Resistance (Spell)|spell resistance]]* spell does not improve.

**GM Note**

*Spell Secret:* A successful [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check (DC 45) allows the caster to ignore ONE of the following prerequisites: Fiendish caster or caster must have spell resistance as an extraordinary ability for *resonating resistance* to function. Two successful [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] checks at that DC removes both prerequisites.
